wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Weldon (12 November 1900 – 1953) was a Scottish footballer who played as an inside left for Kilsyth Rangers, Airdrieonians, Everton, Hull City, West Ham United, Lovells Athletic, Rochdale, Dundalk and Bangor.

response: Storrie was the stepson of Willie Hewitt who played for Partick Thistle, and the son-in-law of Tony Weldon whose clubs included Airdrieonians and Everton.Jim Storrie – The laughing cavalier, The Mighty Mighty Whites
